sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtntrsmrcvmntrng ( cntc_id , test_class_nm , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #cntcId# , #testClassNm# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #mntrngSttus# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtntrsmrcvmntrng SET cntc_id = #cntcId# , test_class_nm = #testClassNm# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , mntrng_sttus = #mntrngSttus# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND cntc_id = #cntcId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtntrsmrcvmntrng WHERE 1 = 1 AND cntc_id = #cntcId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT cntc_id , test_class_nm , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNTRSMRCVMNTRNG WHERE cntc_id = #cntcId#

SELECT A.CNTC_ID , A.TEST_CLASS_NM , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.MNTRNG_STTUS , A.CREAT_DT , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT CNTC_ID , TEST_CLASS_NM , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , MNTRNG_STTUS , CREAT_DT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNTRSMRCVMNTRNG WHERE 1=1
CNTC_ID = #searchKeyword#
TEST_CLASS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY CNTC_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNTRSMRCVMNTRNG WHERE 1=1
CNTC_ID = #searchKeyword#
TEST_CLASS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
